[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1999047]Vitani[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white]Contact Form and Lost Gauth[/color][/b]
Yesterday, our administrator [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has announced a major improvement in handling email's sent through Hack Forum's contact form. In the past [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] was only able to answer about 20% of all the incoming messages, but By using filters and pre-written canned responses [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has now been able to respond to 100% of all contacts for the past 2 weeks.[i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5320862] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/NotableThreads.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131]Ariana[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5320862][b]Contact Form and Lost Gauth[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If your account has been hacked, you forgot your password, or you lost access to Gauth, Omniscient has recently made the recovery process faster. This is great, however, Omni still states that the process will not be guaranteed, but you will still get a response from the Contact Form.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5314363][b]Hernia[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]This is not exactly an announcement thread regarding the site, but Hack Forums owner Omniscient made a thread letting members know that he had an operation done to repair a double inguinal hernia.

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5317930][b]Ethereum Convinced[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]In this thread Omniscient leaves a link that offers members a chance to learn more about the Ethereum currency that has struck a lot of popularity the past few months.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5289148][b]The Complete Guide to FIFA Ultimate Team[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1754362][color=#EFEFEF][b]Vanilla[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Vanilla has created a very detailed guide on FIFA Ultimate Team. Definitely a must read for beginners.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5315898][b]403 Forbidden Error: It's Probably Your Userscript[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841][color=#EFEFEF][b]Night Fury[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you use userscripts this thread is a must see. Some members who use certain userscripts may trigger Hack Forums firewall and be blocked from the website for a few minutes.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5316636][b]How would you describe yourself in a sentence?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2172949][color=#99FF00][b]ihopeshe18[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]In what ways would you describe yourself? Are you chill, wacky, awesome? Let the community know!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5314186][b]Would you suck 500 penises for $10,000,000?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=#EFEFEF][b]heartthrob.[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]This very lewd thread which as reached over 200 replies has become very popular in the lounge the past few days.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5317498][b]Game of Thrones memes[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3115734][color=#99FF00][b]Mr Chow[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Who does not love memes? It is preposterous not to. If you have any Game of Thrones memes lying around, post them here!

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5318825][b]Don't be a bitch, be a rich bitch | Rich Bitch award giveaway | 7/1[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2858602][color=#00AAFF][b]ClawzTech[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Sometimes in life people will shame you for being a bitch, but no one will shame you for being a Rich Bitch.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5314243][b][SheepGang] Free Upgrade / Award ~ Everyone ~[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1803034][color=#EFEFEF][b]KnucklezHF[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Enter for your chance to win an upgrade courtesy of the member, KnucklesHF.

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5309300][b]Zachary's 1k posts feedback[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2960032][color=#99FF00][b]Zach™[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Zach™ has created another feedback thread with this one being more detailed than the last. Congrats on 1,000 posts!

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5288278][b]Official 2016 NBA Finals thread (Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Golden State Warriors)[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=187420][color=#00AAFF][b]iDuL[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Cavs fans rejoice, the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Golden State Warriors in game #7 and claim the NBA title.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5315920][b]BRITAIN VOTES YES ON BREXIT!!![/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=67412][color=#00AAFF][b]Vigor[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]UK has voted yes to leave EU.


[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/Interview.png[/img]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473].Sinister[/url][/i][/b][/align]
[color=#1E90FF][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889]heartthrob.[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]


[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] heartthrob., welcome to this edition of the HF News. Any shoutouts you want to make before we begin?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] Shoutout to Echo and Free Understalker

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Tell us a bit about yourself, heartthrob. What got you started on HF, and what keeps you from staying on HF everyday?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] I started on HF a while ago, I was looking for Minecraft hacks I think. I sorta got involved in the griefing section for the first few months of my stay on HF. However, since then I've spent a lot of time in The Lounge, and group subforums which are mainly the reasons why I stay. I've felt very "burnt out" recently I guess you could say. Without the official and unofficial groups I'm a part of, I probably wouldn't still be on HF since posting all day has gotten very boring to me in the past few weeks.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] How would you describe your time here on HF? What have you liked about it and vice versa?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] Honestly I'd probably describe my time on HF as awful. However that doesn't mean that I have anything against HF, it's just that all the time I've spent in The Lounge I could have spent in another section doing something useful that would benefit me later on. I've liked almost everything about the site itself, there's not much I would change if anything. The only thing I can really think of is staff getting involved with deal disputes, however with the trust scan being added I don't think that's something that should be changed.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] You mentioned you rather do something useful. Is there anything particular you want to do? Learning something new perhaps?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] I was thinking about trying out programming but I honestly don't have the patience and on top of that I get frustrated very easily, so when I get errors I would most likely just quit. I'm looking a lot around HF and computer/cyber security has really interested me lately. Maybe I'll read some guides and try to learn a thing or two about that.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] I recommend that you do. It's okay to make errors. You just have to learn from it. What do you see yourself doing in 2 years from now?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] I'd rather not say publicly to keep things on the down low, however I see myself collaborating with certain celebrities very soon. I'll probably still be around on HF, just not as much.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Do you currently like where you are in your life or do you want to change it? If it's the latter, how so?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] I like where I'm at a lot better than I did before, I'm definitely in a better spot than I was a few months ago.. However I'm always looking forward to change. I love changing for the better.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Is there anything you hope to accomplish later in life? 
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] I really want to be able to work for myself, doing something I love. Now, I haven't found that something I love yet, but right now I can say that I'm really liking the idea of creating my own brand. I dislike the idea of working for someone else my whole life.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] So you sort have an entrepreneurial mindset? Have you done anything to get closer to that lifestyle that you want?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] Yeah, I'm very business oriented I guess one could say. I've taken business classes in school and learned a lot that I didn't know before, like personal finance for example. But outside of classes I haven't done much else.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473][color=#D63030][b].Sinister:[/b][/color][/url] Thank you for taking the time out of your day for this interview. Is there anything you want to say before we wrap this up? 
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2739889][color=white][b]heartthrob.:[/b][/color][/url] #freeunderstalker and Musketeer is fat

[/spoiler][/align][/align]


[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/Memo.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1999047]Vitani[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[i]Never give up, and be confident in what you do. 
There may be tough times, but the difficulties which you face will make you more determined to achieve your objectives and to win against all the odds.[/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2110841]Night Fury[/url][/i][/b][/align]


[url=http://www.itv.com/news/2016-06-24/david-cameron-to-resign-as-prime-minister-after-eu-referendum/][b][color=white]Prime Minister of Britain Resigns[/color][/b][/url]
As a result of Britain's population voting to exit the European Union, Prime Minister David Cameron has announced his resignation from office. Cameron supported the notion of remaining in the EU, but seeing as the majority of citizens thought differently, he has decided that Britain is in need of "fresh leadership." Cameron will not step down immediately, but in October. Given his exit, someone else will be expected to negotiate the nation's departure from the EU. Boris Johnson is predicted to be the successor of Cameron. 

[url=http://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2016/06/18/482599089/canada-legalizes-physician-assisted-dying?utm_source=facebook.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20160618][b][color=white]Canada Legalizes Euthanasia[/color][/b][/url]
Physicians can now aid people in coming to their death. However, not everyone is eligible for euthanasia. As the law states, it "limits the option to the incurably ill, requires medical approval and mandates a 15-day waiting period." Attempts were made to add an amendment which would allow people suffering from debilitating disorders to also have access to physician-assisted death, but the attempts were unsuccessful. As the legislation currently stands, it is supported by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.

[url=https://meduza.io/en/news/2016/06/20/russian-state-television-accidentally-broadcasts-evidence-that-moscow-uses-cluster-bombs-in-syria][b][color=white]Russia-Run Media Accidentally Shows Evidence of Russian Aircraft Equipped with Cluster Bombs in Syria[/color][/b][/url]
RT, Russia's state-run media, made a very large mistake this past week. Video footage of a Russian jet at Khmeimim Air Base was broadcast with RBK-500 ZAB 2.5SM incendiary cluster bombs equipped on the aircraft. After realizing the mistake, RT redacted the footage from later broadcasts. Russia has been accused of using these munitions in the past, but the country's Defense Ministry spokesperson has denied the accusations and said that Moscow does not operate an airbase in Khmeimim. The 2010 Convention on Cluster Munitions prohibits the usage of cluster bombs, but Russia, among other countries, has refused to ratify the treaty.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center]
[img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/TechNews.png[/img][b][i]
By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1356937]Angel[/url][/i][/b][/align]
[align=left]

[color=white][url=https://globenewswire.com/news-release/2016/06/24/851170/0/en/Incipio-Group-to-Acquire-Skullcandy-Create-Leading-Technology-Creative-Culture-and-Mobile-Lifestyle-Company.html][b]Incipio to Acquire Skullcandy[/b][/url][/color]
Mobile device accessory maker Incipio have announced plans to acquire Skullcandy, which specializes in world-class audio solutions, and gaming products through its Astro Gaming brand. This is the fourth in a spate of recent acquisitions by Incipio, with the company having acquired Incase and Clamcase last year, and Braven back in 2013. Incipio LLC says it will pay $5.75 per share for all of Skullcandy Inc., resulting in a cash deal worth $177 million.  The acquisition, which has been approved by both the companies' board, is expected to close in the third quarter of 2016, subject to regulatory approvals and the satisfaction of other customary closing conditions.

[color=white][url=http://youtubecreator.blogspot.jp/2016/06/well-do-it-livea-new-chapter-in.html][b]YouTube Announces Mobile Live Streaming[/b][/url][/color]
YouTube will soon put the power of live streaming in the palm of your hand. With the introduction of this new feature, YouTube is finally ready to take on Periscope, Facebook Live, and other live streaming mobile services, as the company is building live mobile video broadcasting right into the core YouTube app. Firing up a live stream seems pretty simple, according to the introductory blog post. "You won’t need to open anything else, just hit the big red capture button right there in the corner, take or select a photo to use as a thumbnail, and you can broadcast live to your fans and chat in near real time," YouTube says.

[color=white][url=https://techcrunch.com/2016/06/23/start-your-speculation-engines-apple-is-discontinuing-its-thunderbolt-display/][b]Apple to Discontinue the Only Monitor They Make, the Thunderbolt Display[/b][/url][/color]
Starting Thursday, the Thunderbolt Display will not be available in Apple stores, including online and retail locations. Sure, you will be able to snatch one through any existing stock in the online and brick-and-mortar Apple Stores, but it does not plan to continue manufacturing the current model. The news is not necessarily surprising, considering the various rumors that preceded WWDC 2016, suggesting that Apple will unveil a more exciting Thunderbolt monitor at the show. Those reports were quickly shot down, and Apple focused on software during the event, without announcing any sort of new hardware upgrades.
[/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center]
[img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/GamingNews.png[/img]
[i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2364291][b]Buffy Summers[/b][/url][/i][/align]

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/no-mans-sky-dev-explains-e3-no-show-says-we-cant-m/1100-6441240/][color=white]The Release of No Man's Sky is Rapidly Approaching![/color][/url][/b]
No Man's Sky wasn't present at E3, but that is no reason to worry about the future of the game says the boss of the game's development, Sean Murray. When tweeted about the game's absence at E3, he responded that they could've attended E3 to generate more hype or stay home to make the game even better than it already is. They opted to make the game even more impressive than it is already looking! No Man's Sky was already delayed from a June release to an August one. Murray still stands behind the decision. The game's concept is especially ambitious and hasn't been done by anyone on this scale. No one expected this from the small indie studio, Hello World. For those of you that aren't aware, No Man's Sky is a game in which players can freely perform within an entire procedurally generated deterministic open universe with over 18 quintillion planets! Each planet with have unique fauna and flora to offer a truly rewarding experience. It will feel like you are exploring an entire galaxy. Murray stated that the game is coming along quite well and that his team is working as hard as they can to produce a magnificently polished product. Development is currently on time and the game is scheduled to hit shelves August 9. 

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/no-mans-sky-dev-explains-e3-no-show-says-we-cant-m/1100-6441240/][color=white]Frank West Returns for Dead Rising 4[/color][/url][/b]
Leaked gameplay footage of Dead Rising 4 has leaked this week and quite a bit of information can be gathered from it. The footage was leaked by an unknown source and "represents an early build of the game" on Windows PC. Frank West, the star of Dead Rising 4, is back at it again with his camera. The leaked footage showcases Frank West taking photographs with his camera which points to the photography function of the original Dead Rising returning in some fashion. You can also take selfies now. A lot has changed in ten years, huh? Frank is also seen wondering around the Willamette Mall, the original location of the first game. It appears that he is in some type of underground lab facility that zombies have overrun. There is plenty of action footage showcased in the leaked footage as well. Frank West can be seen shooting assault rifles and riding a modified vehicle that appears to be a lawnmower with a flamethrower attached to it! Dead Rising 4 will launch on December 6 this year. It will be available on Xbox One and Windows 10 PC. However, Microsoft has confirmed that it is possible that it will eventually make its way to PS4 and Steam. 

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/no-mans-sky-dev-explains-e3-no-show-says-we-cant-m/1100-6441240/][color=white]Sony Might Owe You Money![/color][/url][/b]
The ability to install Linux onto the original PS3 was a big reason for some to purchase the system, but Sony locked out support for it in 2010. Many weren't happy and it resulted in a class-action lawsuit being filed against Sony. It took six years, but Sony has finally agreed to settle the case. Sony has agreed to pay 55$ to ~10 million PS3 users. In order to get the full 55$ you must "attest under oath to their purchase of the product and installation of Linux, provide proof of their purchase or serial number and PlayStation Network Sign-in ID, and submit some proof of their use of the Other OS functionality". Console owners can also claim $9 in a process that is less involved. To do this, they must send in a claim that explains how, when they bought the system, they "knew about the Other OS, relied upon the Other OS functionality, and intended to use the Other OS functionality." These offers are only available to PS3 owners that bought the console between November 1, 2006 and April 1, 2010. A judge hasn't decided if the settlement offer will be approved as of yet. We will know the outcome this upcoming July.


[align=center]Gaming Video of the Week[sp]

[yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzJ8s9trbVQ[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]     [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/HackingNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4413]Phіus[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[url=http://thehackernews.com/2016/03/fbi-tor-browser-exploit.html][b][color=white]FBI Classifies Tor Browser Exploit[/color][/b][/url]
The FBI is notorious for busting numerous deep-web operations from pedophilia to blackhat hacking. In some of their recent conquers they used a vulnerability in the Tor browser to identify members of these forums. Federal judge, Robert J. Bryan ordered the FBI to reveal the details of this exploit to confirm that the evidence gathered against the users was covered under the warrant issued to the FBI, and therefore admissible in court. The FBI responded by claiming that revealing the exploit would not help in verifying whether they surpassed the extent of their warrant or not, since it would only show the means by which the information was extracted, not what information was actually accessed or retrieved.

[url=http://thehackernews.com/2016/06/unlimited-uber-free-rides.html][b][color=white]Brute-forced Uber Promotion Codes[/color][/b][/url]
A security analyst named Mohamed M. Fouad managed to brute-force multiple Uber promo codes going up to $25,000 in value. After contacting the company's security team about the issue hoping for a fat cheque, they responded by claiming that this vulnerability was out of scope, and therefore null and void in terms of a bounty. Apparently the Uber application is still vulnerable to this attack, perhaps some of our [i]"curious"[/i] readers would like to explore this further.

[url=http://www.ehackingnews.com/2016/06/north-korea-hacks-140k-computers-of.html][b][color=white]North Korea hacks 140,000 South Korean computers[/color][/b][/url]
South Korean police reported that 140,000 computers from 160 South Korean government agencies and firms were compromised and that over 40,000 confidential documents were stolen. This is not the first instance of a cyber attack originating from North Korea targeted at South Korea, it is however one of the most prominent. You may wonder what the reason behind this attack was, South Korean authorities believe it was meant to breed chaos and confusion in the South, or perhaps their goal was to steal classified military and industrial information from their neighboring land.

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v2/ScienceNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=910913]Intelligent Sin[/url][/i][/b][/align]


[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-06/du-rrp061416.php][b][color=white]Sad Music Can Make You Happy[/color][/b][/url]
Researchers at Durham University, UK and the University of Jyväskylä, Finland, have shed a new light on depressing tunes that we would typically associate with feeling down. Multiple surveys consisting of 2,436 people across the UK and Finland were conducted to observe the emotional response of the individual when listening to sad music. The university found that the majority of individuals listening to the sad music reported a pleasant experience. According to the researchers, these pleasant experience derived from the tune itself or enjoyable memories invoked by the music. Though, the University was careful to point out that there were those which felt sad, depressed, and even alone when being introduced to the music. So, don't play a song for your grandmother and expect a smile!

[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-06/acu-tbw060816.php][b][color=white]Sheding a Tear Isn't a Bad Thing[/color][/b][/url]
Professor Joseph Ciarrochi at the Institute for Positive Psychology and Education at Australian Catholic University has recently led a study that shows boys with an empathetic nature averaged 1.8 more girlfriends than those who do not. This being the first study of its kind by examining empathy in relation to a friendship between male and female classmates. After surveying Over 1,970 high school students in Queensland and New South Wales, the survey showed that females preferred empathetic males in their friend circle. To the contrary, empathy didn't seem to affect the males friend circle whatsoever; even females with above average levels of empathy didn't garner the attention of the opposite sex. Furthermore, when students were asked to nominate their peers for friendship males tended to feel more supported when receiving higher numbers of nominations, but this same dynamic was found absent in female students. 

[url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2016/06/160615111712.htm][b][color=white]Hot Beverages May Lead to Esophageal Cancer[/color][/b][/url]
In may, USC's Mariana Stern and 22 other scientists from 10 countries met to determine whether or not the temperature of your drink can lead to esophageal cancer. Stern, an associate professor of preventive medicine and urology at the Keck School of Medicine of USC said, "There is physical evidence that very hot beverages can contribute to cell injury in the esophagus and thus contribute to cancer formation." During this conference, the scientists concluded that beverages above the temperature of 149 degrees Fahrenheit can start to cause this aforementioned cellular damage in and around the esophagus. The scientists did this by comparing over 1,000 studies for twenty different cancers and came to the conclusion that these hot beverages are most likely carcinogenetic just like red meats, tobacco use, or air pollution.
[/font]

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][color=transparent]       [/color]
    [align=center][size=large][b][color=#89dce1]Spotlight[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#e15555]Trends[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#e0d858]Comics[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=white]HF News Team[/color][/b][/size][/align]

[url=http://www.polygon.com/2016/6/23/12020154/counter-strike-csgo-illegal-gambling-lawsuit-weapon-skins-valve][b][color=white]Counter-Strike Player Files Suit Against Valve[/color][/b][/url]
The popular game, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, has now received some back lash from a player in the form of a law suit. In case you are not familiar, CS:GO is your typical first person shooter game, but most people see this game for a lot more than just the shooting part. In the game, you are able to trade skins/knives with players and, essentially, gamble these items with other players. As of late, more websites have been created with the sole purpose in acting as a middle-man for these bets, sort of like an online casino. Michael John McLeod, the person filing this law suit, claims that Valve is supporting the act of under-age gambling since there is no sort of verification required on these gambling sites. McLeod allegedly states that Valve is also profiting from these gambling transactions.

[url=http://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/hip-hop/7416571/kanye-west-famous-video-concept][b][color=white]Kanye West Debuts "Famous" Video[/color][/b][/url]
The famous rapper debuted his "Famous" music video in Los Angeles on June 24. West has always been the type of person to stand out of the crowd with his boldness, and he is still maintaining this association. The rapper explains that the video is a representation of the song name and is claiming the video to be art. The video includes twelve nude people laying in a bed together. In any other music video, these would probably be twelve random people, but in the case of the "Famous" video, these are twelve lifelike celebrities. The celebrities include George W. Bush, Donald Trump, Anna Wintour, Rihanna, Chris Brown, Taylor Swift, Kanye West, Kim Kardashian West, Ray J, Amber Rose, Caitlyn Jenner and Bill Cosby.

[url=http://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/music/50-cent-arrested-swearing-concert-st-kitts-article-1.2688670][b][color=white]50 Cent Arrested in St. Kitts[/color][/b][/url]
On June 25, 50 Cent was booked to host a concert in the Caribbean that evening. Prior to the concert actually starting, 50 Cent was warned that use of profanity is considered to be a misdemeanor offense in St. Kitts, the location where the concert was located. There was around 40,000 people attending the concert, according to TMZ, and while 50 Cent was performing, he managed to slip in a "mother*****" during his performance. This was enough to get the rapper arrested. On June 26, the rapper showed up in court to pay the fine, which is an undisclosed amount.
